channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 1 Image Source: Wikipedia Linux Developed by Linus Torvalds in 1991 Open Source Kernel Compatible with Unix via POSIX Standard Usually Grouped with Other Tools Like GNU into a Linux Distribution Image Source: Wikipedia Image Source: Wikipedia Ubuntu Nguni Bantu: humanity Based on Debian Linux New Release Every 6 Months Long Term Support (LTS) Release Every 2 Years LTS Supported for 5 Years Generally Most Popular Linux Disto Image Source: Wikipedia
